data.title: All PS Plus Games
data.meta_description: All PS5, PS4 games lists for PS Plus Essential, Extra, and Premium - What are all PS Plus games? Sony's PS5 and PS4 subscription service, PlayStation Plus, i...
data.text:
What are all PS Plus games? Sony's PS5 and PS4 subscription service, PlayStation Plus, is jam-packed with hundreds of games available to members. On this page, we're going to tell you everything you need to know about PS Plus, including a full list of all PS Plus games across all three tiers: PS Plus Essential, PS Plus Extra, and PS Plus Premium. In addition, we'll tell you what each subscription offers and which games are joining or leaving the service.

PS Plus Essential

PS Plus Essential, the most basic tier of PS Plus, guarantees users at least two games for PS5 and PS4 per month. These games are made available for one month only, and must be added to your Game Library during that period. Once they're part of your Game Library, you'll be able to download and play them at any time, as long as you maintain an active membership.

All PS Plus Essential Games Available Now

The following 3 PS Plus Essential games are available now to PS Plus Essential, PS Plus Extra, and PS Plus Premium members:

Ender Lilies: Quietus of the Knights PS4 Available until 2nd Sep 2024

Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach PS4 PS5 Available until 2nd Sep 2024

LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga PS4 PS5 Available until 2nd Sep 2024

PS Plus Extra

PS Plus Extra is the second tier of PS Plus. It includes all of the perks and benefits from PS Plus Essential as well as a huge catalogue of PS5 and PS4 games that can be downloaded and played at any time, as long as you remain subscribed.

All PS Plus Extra Games List

The following PS Plus Extra games are available to PS Plus Extra and PS Plus Premium members. There are currently 630 games available with PS Plus Extra:

PS Plus Premium

PS Plus Premium is the third tier of PS Plus. It includes all of the perks and benefits from PS Plus Essential and PS Plus Extra in addition to a catalogue of PSP, PS2, and PS1 games which can be downloaded and played, so long as you have an active subscription. In select territories, all PS Plus Extra and PS Plus Premium games can be cloud streamed as well, including a wide range of PS3 games. Please note that PS3 games cannot be downloaded, they can only be played via streaming.

One thing to keep in mind is that in countries where cloud streaming is not available, a cheaper version of the PS Plus Premium tier is available called PS Plus Deluxe, which excludes all PS3 games. It's identical in all other ways, however.

All PS Plus Premium Games List

The following PS Plus Premium games are available to PS Plus Premium members only. There are currently 467 games available with PS Plus Premium:

All PS Plus Premium Time Limited Trials

PS Plus Premium (or PS Plus Deluxe) also provides access to Time Limited Trials as an additional perk. These games can be downloaded in their entirety and played for a set number of hours, with any progress you make transferring to the full game should you decide to purchase it.

The following games currently have Time Limited Trials for PS Plus Premium members only:

Upcoming Additions

New PS Plus games are added every month. Sony makes PS Plus Essential addition announcements on the last Wednesday of the month, while PS Plus Extra and PS Plus Premium additions are revealed in the middle of the month.

The following PS Plus Essential, PS Plus Extra, and PS Plus Premium games will be available from the attributed dates:

Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions PS4 PS5 Available 3rd Sep 2024 until 30th Sep 2024 (PS+ Essential)

Not all PS Plus games are available forever. In this section, we'll be going through which games are on their way out of PS Plus. If you've yet to play any of the below titles, you'll have until the below dates to do so. Here are the upcoming expiry dates for PS Plus Essential, PS Plus Extra, and PS Plus Premium games:

Ender Lilies: Quietus of the Knights PS4 Available until 2nd Sep 2024 (PS+ Essential)

Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach PS4 PS5 Available until 2nd Sep 2024 (PS+ Essential)

LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga PS4 PS5 Available until 2nd Sep 2024 (PS+ Essential)

Harry Potter: Quidditch Champions PS4 PS5 Available 3rd Sep 2024 until 30th Sep 2024 (PS+ Essential)

That completes our list of all PS Plus games. As well as all PS Plus games listed on this page, there are many other benefits to being a PS Plus subscriber. For more information about what each PS Plus tier offers, refer to All PS Plus Tiers Explained.

You can also check out our list of the Best PS Plus Games available right now. If you want to stay in the loop with upcoming releases, be sure to also refer to our New PS5 Games Release Dates in 2023 and New PS4 Games Release Dates in 2023 guides.

If you need to purchase a PS Plus subscription, then you can find Where to Buy Cheap PlayStation Wallet Top-Ups and PS Plus Subscriptions through the link.
